name: quiver-dance
effect: Raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
